topic: 14. The primary purpose of configuration status reporting is to
options: allow revision of project schedule and cost estimates by project managers
evaluate the performance of software developers and organizations
make sure that change information is communicated to all affected parties
topic_cn: 14. 配置状态报告的主要目的是
options_cn: 允许项目经理修订项目进度和成本估算
评估软件开发人员和组织的绩效
确保变更信息传达给所有受影响方
